trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> class contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> objects.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> to add.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Add(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method adds a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object to the collection.
The zero-based index in the collection where the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> was added.
trans-unit.target: Отсчитываемый от нуля индекс в коллекции, указывающий положение добавленного <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attribute" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="attribute" /> является неопределенной ссылкой (<see langword="Nothing" /> в Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified objects to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Добавляет указанные объекты в текущую коллекцию.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> objects to add to the collection.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.AddRange(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[])" /> method adds an array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.AddRange(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[])" /> добавляет массив объектов <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> в коллекцию.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributes" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="attributes" /> является неопределенной ссылкой (<see langword="Nothing" /> в Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: One of the members of <paramref name="attributes" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Один из членов <paramref name="attributes" /> является пустой ссылкой (<see langword="Nothing" /> в Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> collection to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Коллекция <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />, которую необходимо добавить в данную коллекцию.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.AddRange(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection)" /> method adds a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.AddRange(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection)" /> добавляет объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> в текущую коллекцию.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeCollection" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="attributeCollection" /> является неопределенной ссылкой (<see langword="Nothing" /> в Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object for which to search.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Contains(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method determines whether this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object contains a specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Contains(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> определяет, содержит ли данный объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> указанный объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> is part of the collection; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, если указанный объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> является частью коллекции; в противном случае — <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Одномерный массив, являющийся назначением элементов, копируемых из объекта <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <c>array</c> where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Отсчитываемый от нуля индекс в массиве <c>array</c>, с которого начинается копирование.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.CopyTo(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[],System.Int32)" /> method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.CopyTo(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[],System.Int32)" /> копирует всю коллекцию в одномерный массив, начиная с указанного индекса целевого массива.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions
Exception
Condition
ArgumentNullException
`array` is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Параметр `array` является неопределенной ссылкой (`Nothing` в Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: ArgumentOutOfRangeException
`index` is less than zero.
ArgumentException
`array` is multidimensional
-or-

The number of elements in the source <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection> is greater than the available space from `index` to the end of the destination `array`.
trans-unit.target: Число элементов в исходной коллекции <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection> больше доступного места от положения, заданного значением параметра `index`, до конца массива назначения `array`.

trans-unit.source: InvalidCastException
The type of the source <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination `array`.
trans-unit.target: Тип исходного массива <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection> не может быть автоматически приведен к типу массива назначения `array`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object for which the index is returned.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.IndexOf(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.IndexOf(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> возвращает индекс (с нуля) первого вхождения указанного объекта <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> в коллекцию <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Значение индекса указанного объекта <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />, если он найден; в противном случае — -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the collection at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Индекс (с нуля) места вставки объекта <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> в коллекцию.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object to insert.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method inserts a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object into the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> вставляет объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> в коллекцию <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> по указанному индексу.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="value" /> является неопределенной ссылкой (<see langword="Nothing" /> в Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero, or <paramref name="index" /> is greater than the number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Значение параметра <paramref name="index" /> меньше нуля, или <paramref name="index" /> больше числа элементов в объекте <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object.

The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> property contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object at the specified <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: Свойство <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> содержит объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> по указанному индексу <paramref name="index" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object at the specified <paramref name="index" />.
Exceptions
Exception
Condition
ArgumentException
You attempted to set the property to `null`.
The object to evaluate.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> method verifies that <paramref name="value" /> is a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> проверяет, является ли <paramref name="value" /> объектом <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions
Exception
Condition
ArgumentException
`value` is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), or `value` is not a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification> object.
trans-unit.target: `value` является пустой ссылкой (`Nothing` в Visual Basic), или `value` не <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification> объекта.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object to remove.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Remove(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Remove(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> удаляет первое вхождение указанного объекта <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> из коллекции.
